channel.title: I've been thinking about something
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "I've been thinking about something" - HoClause related.

item.title: I've been thinking about something
item.content:encoded:
Hokage literally means fire shadow. The billy versus snakeman person(forgot his name D:) replaced shadow with clause to make it a Santa Clause thing. That makes it fire clause. But what if the other kages were to be Santa Clause, and would they be the Santa Clause in their villages?

What are others opinions on this?

KazaClause sounds pretty cool to me.
